name: 疾风隼
description: 俯冲时速可达惊人的速度，锋利的羽翼能切割空气。是最出色的空中猎手之一。

image_prompts.design: A streamlined falcon with deep blue body. Blade-sharp wing tips, piercing eagle eyes. Forked tail takes the shape of wind currents. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on wing blades, ink sketch texture on feather patterns, non-reflective surface with matte deep blue tones, swift and deadly hunter.
